activities: Seyda Research Consultants (SRC) is a marketing research consulting company. SRC surveys gather opinions via surveys about products and services that are used to guide the development and/or improvement of products andd services, and their associated advertising, communication and marketing programs. We collect three kinds of information: (1) opinions about issues of interest to us or our clients, (2) background household information, and (3) personally identifiable information about survey participants. Some of this information may be collected by telephone or face-to-face contact, while other information is collected online. Data from online and offline sources is typically merged for analytic purposes.
